GroupBox.Name: GB_import
GroupBox.Ctrls: sql:INSERT INTO hr_attendance (hr_employee_id,DATE,punch_in,punch_in_note,punch_out,punch_out_note,description,created_by,creation_date,last_update_by,last_update_date) VALUES((SELECT hr_employee_id FROM hr_employee_v WHERE name='%{雇员}' LIMIT 0,1),'%{日期}','%{上班时间}','%{上班(备注)}','%{下班时间}','%{下班(备注)}','%{备注}',%{user_id},NOW(),%{user_id},NOW());sql:INSERT INTO hr_attendance (hr_employee_id,DATE,punch_in,punch_in_note,punch_out,punch_out_note,description,created_by,creation_date,last_update_by,last_update_date) VALUES((SELECT hr_employee_id FROM hr_employee_v WHERE employee_number='%1' LIMIT 0,1),'%2','%3','%4','%5','%6','%7',%{user_id},NOW(),%{user_id},NOW());
